chapter.title: Database Schema
chapter.para: This is the schema for the Evergreen database.

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing acq.exchange_rate via Foreign Key Constraints
Tables referencing acq.distribution_formula_entry via Foreign Key Constraints

listitem.para: CHECK (((owning_lib IS NOT NULL) OR (location IS NOT NULL)))

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing acq.fiscal_year via Foreign Key Constraints
Tables referencing acq.fund_allocation via Foreign Key Constraints

listitem.para: CHECK ((((percent IS NULL) AND (amount IS NOT NULL)) OR ((percent IS NOT NULL) AND (amount IS NULL))))

Tables referencing acq.fund_tag_map via Foreign Key Constraints
Tables referencing acq.fund_allocation via Foreign Key Constraints

listitem.para: CHECK (((picklist IS NOT NULL) OR (purchase_order IS NOT NULL)))
